## Final dataset consisting the total disease outbreaks (1996-2022)

**Merge of two datasets**

```{r}
#| echo: false
#Load Library
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#Merge datasets
 
Total_Outbreaks <- 
  full_join(unique_dons_clean, covid_outbreaks_clean) |>
  distinct()

write.csv(Total_Outbreaks, "/home/people/s223712/group_12_project/_raw/Total_Outbreaks.csv")

```
